body: We also use @Startup on @Produces methods and get the same warning.
I agree that the warning is misleading and it was probably added by accident. We should only log this warning for invalid non-producer methods annotated with `@Startup`.

issue.title: ArC: skip warning about invalid startup for producer methods

labels.name: triage/waiting-for-ci
labels.description: Ready to merge when CI successfully finishes
